PromiseRunner - Interface in me.joeycumines.javapromises.v1

PromiseState - Enum in me.joeycumines.javapromises.core
A promise can have one of three states, pending, fulfilled, or rejected.
PromiseTyped<T> - Interface in me.joeycumines.javapromises.core
A convenience, that allows you to simply add this to your Promise implementation as an interface, giving you the ability to have strict typing on the return type of then.
